content: FHIR-I approved publication of a set of bulk data technical corrections on July 13th, however, it hasn't been published yet and Troy Biesterfeld noticed a capitalization error on two of the resource names in the CapabilityStatement. Can we add an item to the agenda for the next FHIR-I meeting (presumably Oct. 12, although it's a holiday in the US), to approve the addition of this fix to the technical correction publication?
I create an issue for this at https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28951
